creator: anthonygerrard+apache.org@gmail.com
text:
The docs for AccessLogValve include a renameOnRotate attribute 

http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-7.0-doc/config/valve.html#Access_Log_Valve/Attributes

But it seems to have no effect and looking at the code doesn't seem to be implemented.

creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
text:
Yes, there is no such feature in 7.0.33. It was added in 7.0.34.

If you have not noticed yet, 7.0.34 was released 6 days ago.
